question: Show all of the european research council panel descriptions from projects that started in 2016
query: select distinct erc_panels.description from projects join project_erc_panels on projects.unics_id = project_erc_panels.project join erc_panels on project_erc_panels.panel = erc_panels.code where projects.start_year = '2016'
readable_query: SELECT DISTINCT erc_panels.description FROM erc_panels JOIN project_erc_panels ON erc_panels.code = project_erc_panels.panel JOIN projects ON project_erc_panels.project = projects.id WHERE projects.start_year = 2016

question: How many european research council panel descriptions are there for projects that do not have the acronym belenus?
query: select count(distinct erc_panels.description) from projects join project_erc_panels on projects.unics_id = project_erc_panels.project join erc_panels on project_erc_panels.panel = erc_panels.code where projects.acronym != 'BELENUS'
readable_query: SELECT DISTINCT count(DISTINCT  erc_panels.description) FROM erc_panels JOIN project_erc_panels ON erc_panels.code = project_erc_panels.panel JOIN projects ON project_erc_panels.project = projects.id WHERE projects.acronym != 'BELENUS'

question: The descriptions of the European Research Council panels who have funded projects whose starting date is after August 13, 2018.
query: select distinct erc_panels.description from project_erc_panels join erc_panels on project_erc_panels.panel = erc_panels.code join projects on projects.unics_id = project_erc_panels.project where projects.start_date >= '2018-08-13'
readable_query: SELECT DISTINCT erc_panels.description FROM erc_panels JOIN project_erc_panels ON erc_panels.code = project_erc_panels.panel JOIN projects ON project_erc_panels.project = projects.id WHERE projects.start_date >= '2018-08-13'

question: Added total cost of projects with a member from a Medical Engineering department outside the region of Hildburghausen.
query: select sum(projects.total_cost) from eu_territorial_units join institutions on eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = institutions.geocode_regions_3 join project_members on institutions.unics_id = project_members.institution_id join projects on project_members.project = projects.unics_id where eu_territorial_units.description != 'Hildburghausen' and project_members.department_name = 'Medical Engineering'
readable_query: SELECT sum( projects.total_cost) FROM projects JOIN project_members ON projects.id = project_members.project JOIN institutions ON project_members.institution_id = institutions.id JOIN eu_territorial_units ON institutions.geocode_regions_3 = eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions WHERE eu_territorial_units.description != 'Hildburghausen' and project_members.department_name = 'Medical Engineering'

question: Total number of descriptions of European Union territorial units for all countries except Australia and where the OPENLIGHTCOMM LTD company is based.
query: select count(distinct eu_territorial_units.description) from institutions join eu_territorial_units on institutions.geocode_regions_3 = eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions join countries on countries.unics_id = institutions.country_id where countries.country_code2 != 'AU' and institutions.institutions_name = 'OPENLIGHTCOMM LTD'
readable_query: SELECT DISTINCT count(DISTINCT  eu_territorial_units.description) FROM eu_territorial_units JOIN institutions ON eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = institutions.geocode_regions_3 JOIN countries ON institutions.country_id = countries.id WHERE countries.country_code != 'AU' and institutions.institutions_name = 'OPENLIGHTCOMM LTD'

question: Total number of names of countries not containing Salzburg und Umgebung as territorial unit and where the DAACRO GMBH & CO KG company is placed.
query: select count(distinct countries.country_name) from project_members join institutions on project_members.institution_id = institutions.unics_id join countries on institutions.country_id = countries.unics_id join eu_territorial_units on eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = project_members.geocode_regions_3 where eu_territorial_units.description != 'Salzburg und Umgebung' and institutions.institutions_name = 'DAACRO GMBH & CO KG'
readable_query: SELECT DISTINCT count(DISTINCT  countries.country_name) FROM countries JOIN institutions ON countries.id = institutions.country_id JOIN eu_territorial_units ON institutions.geocode_regions_3 = eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions JOIN project_members ON eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = project_members.geocode_regions_3 JOIN institutions ON project_members.institution_id = institutions.id WHERE eu_territorial_units.description != 'Salzburg und Umgebung' and institutions.institutions_name = 'DAACRO GMBH & CO KG'

question: The average funding of projects in which no institution called ICN2 is a member, whose title is "Modernisation of Vessels for Inland waterway freight Transport", and in which the Large Systems Business Unit department participates..
query: select avg(projects.total_cost) from institutions join project_members on institutions.unics_id = project_members.institution_id join projects on project_members.project = projects.unics_id where institutions.acronym != 'ICN2' and projects.title = 'Modernisation of Vessels for Inland waterway freight Transport' and project_members.department_name = 'Large Systems Business Unit'
readable_query: SELECT avg( projects.total_cost) FROM projects JOIN project_members ON projects.id = project_members.project JOIN institutions ON project_members.institution_id = institutions.id WHERE institutions.acronym != 'ICN2' and projects.title = 'Modernisation of Vessels for Inland waterway freight Transport' and project_members.department_name = 'Large Systems Business Unit'

question: Count the number of distinct acronyms for the institutions having a project programme "Safe and sustainable nanotechnologies" whose members are all in the city "Sarno SA"
query: select count(distinct institutions.acronym) from project_programmes join projects on project_programmes.project = projects.unics_id join project_members on projects.unics_id = project_members.project join institutions on project_members.institution_id = institutions.unics_id join programmes on programmes.code = project_programmes.programme where programmes.short_name = 'Safe and sustainable nanotechnologies' and projects.start_year > 0  and project_members.city = 'SARNO SA'
readable_query: SELECT DISTINCT count(DISTINCT  institutions.acronym) FROM institutions JOIN project_members ON institutions.id = project_members.institution_id JOIN projects ON project_members.project = projects.id JOIN project_programmes ON projects.id = project_programmes.project JOIN programmes ON project_programmes.programme = programmes.code WHERE programmes.short_name = 'Safe and sustainable nanotechnologies' and projects.start_year > 0 and project_members.city = 'SARNO SA'

readable_query: SELECT DISTINCT eu_territorial_units.description FROM eu_territorial_units JOIN project_members ON eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = project_members.geocode_regions_3 WHERE project_members.member_short_name = 'Spoon'

question: What is the average total cost of all projects that end in 2013 or earlier and a have a member institution whose acronym is UCBL?
query: select avg(projects.total_cost) from institutions join eu_territorial_units on institutions.geocode_regions_3 = eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions join project_members on eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = project_members.geocode_regions_3 join projects on project_members.project = projects.unics_id where institutions.acronym = 'UCBL' and projects.end_year <= '2013'
readable_query: SELECT avg( projects.total_cost) FROM projects JOIN project_members ON projects.id = project_members.project JOIN eu_territorial_units ON project_members.geocode_regions_3 = eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions JOIN institutions ON eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = institutions.geocode_regions_3 WHERE institutions.acronym = 'UCBL' and projects.end_year <= 2013

question: What is the average total cost of projects that end at 2020-11-18 and have panel about Immunity and infection?
query: select avg(projects.total_cost) from erc_panels join project_erc_panels on erc_panels.code = project_erc_panels.panel join projects on project_erc_panels.project = projects.unics_id where erc_panels.description = 'Immunity and infection' and projects.end_date != '2020-11-18'
readable_query: SELECT avg( projects.total_cost) FROM projects JOIN project_erc_panels ON projects.id = project_erc_panels.project JOIN erc_panels ON project_erc_panels.panel = erc_panels.code WHERE erc_panels.description = 'Immunity and infection' and projects.end_date != '2020-11-18'

question: Display titles of projects with a member from KJERRGARDEN that is also in the same region as an institution from Norway?
query: select distinct projects.title from countries join institutions on countries.unics_id = institutions.country_id join eu_territorial_units on institutions.geocode_regions_3 = eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions join project_members on eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = project_members.geocode_regions_3 join projects on project_members.project = projects.unics_id where countries.country_code2 = 'NO' and project_members.city = 'KJERRGARDEN'
readable_query: SELECT DISTINCT projects.title FROM projects JOIN project_members ON projects.id = project_members.project JOIN eu_territorial_units ON project_members.geocode_regions_3 = eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions JOIN institutions ON eu_territorial_units.geocode_regions = institutions.geocode_regions_3 JOIN countries ON institutions.country_id = countries.id WHERE countries.country_code = 'NO' and project_members.city = 'KJERRGARDEN'

question: Show me projects that end in 2010 or later and have a panel about Physiology, Pathophysiology and Endocrinology.
